channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Simple Post
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Simple Post

item.title: CVE-2021-24567|2024-08-29T14:33:52.001Z -- unknown -- simple%20post
item.description: The Simple Post WordPress plugin through 1.1 does not sanitize user input when an authenticated user Text value, then it does not escape these values when outputting to the browser leading to an Authenticated Stored XSS Cross-Site Scripting issue.
